name: Beyond Putt : Upgrades Home. Mixed Reality - Mini Golf
summary: "Beyond Putt  in Mixed Reality" is an immersive gaming experience that combines the fun and excitement of traditional mini golf with cutting-edge mixed reality technology. Players can step into a virtual course set in your own home, interact with virtual obstacles and challenges, and compete against friends through Leaderboard. With realistic physics and stunning visuals, Beyond Putt in Mixed Reality offers a unique and engaging twist on a classic game
